titles.title: Small Business Administration Equal Representation Act
To amend the Small Business Act to require the establishment of a regional or branch office of the Small Business Administration in each State.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 2/3/1999--Introduced. Small Business Administration Equal Representation Act - Amends the Small Business Act to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to establish at least one SBA district office in each State.
